tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:name: The Public Review Orange Button Taxonomy 2018
tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:description: The public review Orange Button (Solar) Taxonomy developed by XBRL US and SunSpec Alliance for the Orange Button Initiative.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Full Solar Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the entry point for viewing the entire Orange Button Taxonomy. Documentation labels are included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Solar Cut Sheet (DataSheet).
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the entry point for creating a cutsheet. It includes the elements for a product vendor to define their products.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Solar Device Listing.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the entry point for creating a detailed listing of the equipment comprising a PV system.
